name: Ball Fall 2
description:
- Our game is a fun, addictive catch game that will test your abilities and reflexes, make your movement precise and well-timed in order to catch the right balls. Keep your eyes open and your fingers ready and enjoy the ride ! - The main mission is to get a high score while collecting special falling balls and avoiding the bad ones. We hope you enjoy playing it.

 *Characteristics: All Ages suitable. Scoring and timing system included. Colorful design and superb graphics. Designed to suit most -if not all- screen resolutions. Enthusiastic background audios and sound effects. Have Fun !
